title: going down in Honor
body: I´m a toxic player I´ve been reading about how people want to grind honor,then if take you long time to level up , it'll take you long time to be level 1 and 0 too?

replies.body: It all depends on how many games you're playing and how many honors or reports you're getting. If you go a long time without getting any kind of reports or penalties then you should still be able to rank up. If you're consistently getting reported in every match, you'll probably drop ranks just as fast as you could rank up.
